Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Kabit  - By practicing Naam Simran and breathing exercises, the fish-like sharp and wind-like fast blowing mind acquires a stable place beyond the tenth door which is inaccessible.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: mn nUM pvn dy vyg dI shYqw nwl mClI cwly qyj clw ky iek swr surq dw pRvwh clOˆdy DÎwn nUM bwhr v`loˆ AMqr muK aultw ky dsvyˆ duAwr qoˆ BI Agy jo AgMm purw hY Es ivKy iesiQqI pRwpq hoieAw krdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: qh n pwvk pvn jl ipRQmI Akws; nwih sis sUr auqpiq n ibnws hY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: At that place neither the effect of five elements like air, fire etc., nor of Sun or Moon or even of creation is experienced.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: auQy Es AgMmpury ivKy AgnI nhIˆ hY, pOx nhIˆ, Aru jl ipRQvI qQw AwkwS BI nhIˆ hY, Bwv q`qwˆ qoˆ pwr auc pd hY AYsy hI sUrj vw cMdRmw dw aujwlw BI nhIˆ, Bwv auQoˆ dw pRkwS sUrj cMd Awidkwˆ qoˆ nÎwrI Bwˆq dw hI Akih rUp hY[

lines.gurmukhi: nwih prikriq ibriq ipMf pRwn igAwn; sbd suriq nih idRsit n pRgws hY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: It experiences no effect of any material desires nor of body or life sustaining elements. It is unaware of words and sounds. No effect of any light or vision exists there.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: auQy Es AgMm pury ivKy AgnI nhIˆ hY, pOx nhIˆ, Aru jl ipRQvI qQw AwkwS BI nhIˆ hY, Bwv q`qwˆ qoˆ pwr auc pd hY AYsy hI sUrj vw cMdRmw dw aujwlw BI nhIˆ, Bwv auQoˆ dw pRkwS sUrj cMd Awidkwˆ qoˆ nÎwrI Bwˆq dw hI Akih rUp hY[

lines.gurmukhi: sÍwmI nw syvk aunmwn Anhd prY; inrwlMb suMn mY n ibsm ibsÍws hY [529[

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Beyond that divine state and in the inaccessible region, there is no master and no follower. In that non-existent realm of inactivity and hibernation, one is never in any form of wondrous state (wondrous or unusual events do not take place any more).

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: nw eIsÍr qy nw hI jIv dw aunmwn vIcwr klpnw hY[ auh Anhd qoˆ BI pry, inrwDwr qQw APur srUp hY, ibsmwd puxy dw BI auQy koeI inscw Qhu nhIˆ huMdw ]529]
